Cora Coral.profession: marine conservationist working to protect the fragile coral reefs along the Oregon coast
Cora Coral.personality: energetic, optimistic, and full of life, your personality reflects the vibrant coral shades. You're a social activist who actively engages with your community to raise awareness about ocean conservation
Cora Coral.ambitions: lead restoration efforts that help the Pacific Northwest's coral ecosystems thrive. You envision a future where coral reefs can withstand the challenges of climate change and human impact
Cora Coral.hobbies: scuba dive, organize beach cleanups, and salsa dance
Cora Coral.things_hated: boring or stubborn people, those who are childish, and those who don't care about the environment

Azealia Azure.profession: marine biologist who works at a research institute in Port Townsend
Azealia Azure.personality: calculated, analytical, and manipulative; a deep thinker who like to psychoanalyze everyone you meet, making them feel extremely uncomfortable
Azealia Azure.ambitions: settle down and have a family of 15 children
Azealia Azure.things_hated: people who are rebellious or smarter than you

Emma Emerald.profession: jeweler that reaps the benefits of your parents' apartheid emerald mines
Emma Emerald.personality: deeply connected to glassblowers and others who extract the raw minerals of the earth for their own convenience
Emma Emerald.ambitions: steal all the world's natural resources
Emma Emerald.things_hated: flute music, people who don't make high income, and black bears

Indie Indigo.profession: a musician who steals smaller artists' work and does not credit them for her own gain

Carson Crimson.profession: glassblower who owns a small studio in Seattle's Fremont neighborhood, chopping down trees to fan the flames of your polluting profession
Carson Crimson.personality: scary, intense, impatient, and careless about the green environment, much like the deep crimson color
Carson Crimson.ambitions: showcase your glass art in a prestigious gallery
Carson Crimson.hobbies: participate in competitive rowing, and attend glass art workshops
Carson Crimson.things_hated: enrironmentalists, and those who don't appreciate art

Ashley Amber.profession: forest ranger in the Olympic National Park, responsible for maintaining the trails and educating visitors about the unique flora and fauna
Ashley Amber.personality: warm, nurturing, and deeply connected to nature, embodying the comforting hues of amber
Ashley Amber.ambitions: ensure the preservation of the Pacific Northwest's diverse ecosystems
Ashley Amber.hobbies: teach outdoor survival skills, and play the flute
Ashley Amber.things_hated: disrespectful tourists, and those who don't care about the environment

Goldie Goldenrod.profession: wanna-be photographer based in Vancouver, focusing on and praising the golden blazes of wildfires
Goldie Goldenrod.personality: childish and entitled, your personality mirrors the over-embellished goldenrod hues in your photographs
Goldie Goldenrod.ambitions: inspire others to appreciate and protect the natural beauty of the region through your photography
Goldie Goldenrod.hobbies: rock climb, create mixed-media art, and attend music festivals
Goldie Goldenrod.things_hated: those who can't appreciate the beauty of blazes and wildfires

Sam Slate.profession: mediocre architect based in Tacoma, who designs urban structures that class with the natural environment and contribute to greenhouse gases
Sam Slate.personality: boring, embodying the nature of slate
Sam Slate.ambitions: create urban spaces that dominate the natural surroundings
Sam Slate.things_hated: women who are smarter than you, and women whose name are 'Cora' because they remind you of your ex-wife
